sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"显著的，引人注意的"之意。
means: outstanding ： 通常指与同行或同类的人相比显得优秀或杰出，或具有他人或别的事物所没有的特征。
noticeable ： 指所描绘的事物引人注意。
remarkable ： 通常指因有与众不同的特点或优越性而引起人们注意或称道。
conspicuous ： 通常指因成绩卓著，而引人注意，或指因外观奇特、花哨或言行举止不合常规而令人注意。
striking ： 侧重能给观察者产生强烈而深刻印象。

word_mean: 弧焊时，引燃焊接电弧的过程。

sentence.Network_en: Company officials say striking union members should stay home today.
sentence.Network_cn: 公司管理人员说参加罢工的工会会员今天应该呆在家里。

sentence.Network_en: A survey of 57 hospitals by Newchurch, a consultancy, reveals striking improvements.
sentence.Network_cn: 一家名为纽彻奇的咨询公司对57家医院所作的调查显示改善十分明显。

sentence.Network_en: Blonde and slender, she was too striking to escape their attention.
sentence.Network_cn: 金发细腰的她太引人注目了，他们很难不注意到她。

entry.tran: 引人注目的;异乎寻常的;显著的
entry.def: Something that is striking is very noticeable or unusual.

example.ex: The most striking feature of those statistics is the high proportion of suicides...
example.tran: 那些统计数据最引人注目之处是其极高的自杀率。

example.ex: He bears a striking resemblance to Lenin.

entry.tran: 妩媚动人的;标致的;俊秀的
entry.def: Someone who is striking is very attractive, in a noticeable way.

example.ex: She was a striking woman with long blonde hair.
example.tran: 她是个留着金色长发的俏女郎。

means.word_mean: 1. the physical coming together of two or more things;

sentences.sentence: "contact with the pier scraped paint from the hull"

means.word_mean: 2. the act of contacting one thing with another;

sentences.sentence: "after three misses she finally got a hit"

means.word_mean: 1. sensational in appearance or thrilling in effect;

sentences.sentence: "his striking good looks always created a sensation"

means.word_mean: 2. having a quality that thrusts itself into attention;

sentences.sentence: "an outstanding fact of our time is that nations poisoned by anti semitism proved less fortunate in regard to their own freedom"
"a new theory is the most prominent feature of the book"
"a striking thing about Picadilly Circus is the statue of Eros in the center"
"a striking resemblance between parent and child"

sentences.en: There is a striking difference between Jane and Mary.
sentences.cn: 简和玛丽之间有显著的差异。

means.word_mean: 引人注目的; 容貌出众的

sentences.en: She is a very striking young woman.
sentences.cn: 她是一位非常引人注目的年轻女子。
